Responsibility:
Translating ambitious concepts and ideas into scalable backend and data systems.

Designing, implementing, and maintaining robust data flows and storage systems across a variety of databases.

Prototyping and validating AI concepts, from quick experiments to production-ready integrations.

Developing and evolving data-powered services in Python.

Collaborating closely with other engineers to bring bold ideas to life.
Specific Required Skills/Keywords:
Ability to design and reason about software.

Strong analytical and learning ability: you pick up complex ideas fast and apply them meaningfully.

Ownership and drive: you learn, build, and deliver independently.

AI & Data Science: Recommender systems, natural language processing, machine learning, and data-driven experimentation.

LLM-based systems: Model Context Protocol (MCP), LangChain, LangGraph, and AI-tools.

Backend Engineering: Programming (Python), Backend Frameworks (FastAPI), Object Relational Mappers (SQLAlchemy), Database Migrations (Alembic).

Large-scale databases: OLTP (PostgreSQL), OLAP (ClickHouse), keyâ€“value stores (Redis), document stores (MongoDB), vector stores (PgVector, Pinecone), search systems (Elasticsearch/OpenSearch).

Distributed task processing and orchestration (Celery, Redis).

Behavioral requirement:
Learn new technologies faster than most can explain them.

Build software because you love creating things that work beautifully.

Think deeply about architecture, abstraction, and efficiency.

Communicate clearly and decisively.

Deliver independently, even under ambiguity.

Ownership and drive.

We believe in experiences over things.
